general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage. High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato and brinjal. Mulch coconut leaves to reduce water loss. Cover with paper caps on newly planted vegetable seedlings. In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises. Yellow stem borer management in paddy. Blast disease management in paddy. Tobacco caterpillar management in black gram and green gram. Early shoot borer management in sugarcane. Brinjal shoot and fruit borer management. Whitefly infestation prevention in okra. Onion harvesting and storage advice. Mango hopper control.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical.
Avoid water deficit during critical stages.

High temperature increases water requirement.
Avoid water stagnation in the field.

Install pheromone traps for pest management.
Spray neem-based pesticide at early infestation stage.
Mulch coconut leaves to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted seedlings with paper caps during day time.
Harvest fingerlings in shallow ponds if water temperature rises.
Check and control tobacco caterpillar migration.

Install yellow sticky traps for monitoring.
